problem.text:
Welcome to /r/startups, the place to discuss startup problems and solutions. Startups are companies that are designed to grow and scale rapidly. Be sure to read and follow all of our rules--we have specific places for common content and requests.
Long story short, I just started using Canva recently for design
Have you ever sent out or reviewed by pitch made in Canva? What's your take on it?

team.text: The Canva team includes Jennie Rogerson, Monica Silvestre, Christina (CJ) Jones in key leadership roles.
bullets: Jennie Rogerson — Global Head of People

citations.snippet: Jennie Rogerson — Global Head of People

funding.text:
The jump delivers a quick $126 million windfall for Sydney investment firm Quadrant Private Equity, which nabbed a $500 million slice of Canva in a secondary sale six months ago.
It also takes Canva to within spitting distance of its 2021 valuation peak of $54.5 billion before three key investors, local VCs Blackbird, Square Peg and AirTree, agree to lop 36% off that valuation in 2022 amid a broader downturn in the sector.
“It’s been an extraordinary year for all of us at Canva as we celebrate remarkable growth and increasing demand for our business,” Canva cofounder and COO Cliff Obrecht said.
The company also added 1,000 people to its headcount in 2024.
The new cash comes as Canva’s AI-powered Magic Studio was this week named one of TIME’s Best Inventions of 2024.
